name: My Ketch Basketball －Hoops Champ
description:
This is a physics based basketball shooting game where you can spend a lot of hours!
As a basketball fans,You can show off your basketball skills!
Press on the ball to set power and angle of your shot.Shoot your basketball past many fiendish obstacles and get your ball into the net in as little shots as possible.Try to Overcome all obstacles in each level and become the winer. Try your luck now.
